timeline.bodyText: Please translate the title (or the translation already exists ?)
timeline.author: ale-axelor
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -28,6 +28,7 @@
   	<many-to-one name="printingSettings" ref="PrintingSettings" title="Printing Settings" massUpdate="true"/>
   	
   	<integer name="defaultPartnerTypeSelect" title="Partner Type" selection="company.partner.type.select" default="1" massUpdate="true"/>
+	<integer name="defaultPartnerCategorySelect" title="Partner Category" selection="company.partner.category.select" massUpdate="true"/>
